MGS4 may not be snake eater but in my opinion its just as good and or does the job right, we got some pretty outstanding scenes from MGS4, dont even get me started at the last Last boss fight and other things like raiden and the Ray scene!

Also i love the opening to this game! and the fact snake is an old fart!

I love MGS4!

topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54b44adf6368727d93fc0000#post_54b44adf6368727d93fc0000
Peace walker is fairly significant to the overall story. It sets up caz, Paz, Chico, Huey and mother base  (It also foreshadow's venom snake's hand) 
Taken on its own the story is kinda meh though. 
Gameplay wise it's kinda meh as well. I mean it's got some cool bits but I'd take snake eater or 5 over peace walker any day.
